artist: Engraver: Thomas Ryder; Painter: After W. R. Bigg A.R.A.; Publisher: P. & D. Colnaghi and Co., Ltd.
description: girl in a patterned dress and bonnet; hooked stick in right hand; stick pulling branch down; left hand picks nuts; basket on ground beside her; village in distance left. in an oval frame
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

on sheet in black: T. Ryder Sculpt   W.R. Bigg pinx\'t / VILLAGE GIRL GATHERING NUTS /  London Published as the Act Directs for the Proprietor Jan 10, 1793 by Colnaghi & Co. No.[] Pall Mall & / T Ryder No. 43 Titchfield St. Oxford St.
life_date: London, England and New York, New York
title: Village Girl Gathering Nuts
